title: IIIT Kalyani Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Deputy Registrar and Other Posts
description: Indian Institute of Information Technology Kalyani (IIIT Kalyani) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Deputy Registrar, Senior Technical, Assistant Registrar, and Junior Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc, Any Degree, MCA can grab this chance and apply for the IIIT Kalyani Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, a...
